H0.text: Which European nation was the colonial power of Indonesia for 350 years until officially ceding control in December 1949. Portugal

H1.text: Which European nation was the colonial power of Indonesia for 350 years until officially ceding control in December 1949. Spain

H2.text: Which European nation was the colonial power of Indonesia for 350 years until officially ceding control in December 1949. France

H3.text: Which European nation was the colonial power of Indonesia for 350 years until officially ceding control in December 1949. Olanda

A4.text: The government of the Netherlands established the Dutch East Indies under government control in 1800 after the VOC was dissolved.

A5.text: The Netherlands officially recognised Indonesian sovereignty in December 1949.
